description: Fired when a DEX pool changes.
sql_insert: INSERT INTO trade_pool_change (timestamp, receipt_id, block_height, pool_id, pool) SELECT to_timestamp((value->>'block_timestamp_nanosec')::bigint / 1000000000.0), value->>'receipt_id', (value->>'block_height')::bigint, value->>'pool_id', (value->>'pool')::jsonb FROM jsonb_array_elements($1);

endpoints.query: SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'pool', pool) FROM trade_pool_change WHERE (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'pool', pool) FROM trade_pool_change WHERE (($1->>'after_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id > ($1->>'after_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'pool', pool) FROM trade_pool_change WHERE pool_id = ($1->>'pool_id') AND (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;
